metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2006 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's RxRPC network protocol,within the processing of RxRPC bundles. This issue results from the lack ofproper locking when performing operations on an object. This may allow anattacker to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the contextof the kernel.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
